verses.roman:
nṛtya karite yei āise sannidhāne
mahāprabhu kare tāṅre dṛḍha āliṅgane

synonyms: nṛtya karite—dancing; yei—anyone who; āise—comes; sannidhāne—nearby; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kare—does; tāṅre—unto him; dṛḍha—tight; āliṅgane—embracing.
translation: When someone came nearby while dancing, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu would tightly embrace him.
